titles.title: Venezuelan Liberty Act
To provide for eligibility for relief from removal for certain Venezuelans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration And Border Security.

bill.summary: 3/4/2013--Introduced. Venezuelan Liberty Act - Provides for the adjustment to permanent resident status of a national of Venezuela who has maintained a required physical presence in the United States during the period beginning on February 2, 1999, and ending on March 4, 2013, and who, during such period, applied for asylum and was placed in exclusion, deportation, or removal proceedings. Requires individuals to apply for adjustment before April 1, 2014.
